runs.comm: bowled full and wide and he goes after it immediately, slices it towards third ma, uppishly, for a single
fuller on leg stump, flicks it behind square, Farhad Reza struggles as he tries to stop that but fails, four for Farhat
bowled on a good length on the off, defended into the off side towards cover and they pinch a single
in the channel outside off, Hafeez gets forward and shoulders arms to that one
goodish length outside off, gets a bit of shape away from the right-hander, shoulders arms to leave that alone
another one shaping away from Hafeez, on a driving length but he opts to leave it be
slides it down the leg side, lands on leg stump and it spins down further, Mushfoqur cannot collect that one, five wides
beaten this time as he fails to read the straighter one, looped it on a good length outside off and he tries to stab that one, misses, and is beaten
tossed up, he takes it from a length and drives it hard through extra cover for a couple of runs
another wide down the leg side, fires it on leg stump and it goes down further
shortish on the off, turns back in, punches it towards long-on for a single
coming round the wicket, tossed it up on middle and off, stretches forward and defends on the leg side
short of a good length outside off, goes on straight, quickish, tries to chop it past point, misses
floating it on middle and off, gets forward and just dabs it into the off side
seemed to pitch outside leg and nip back in, struck him high on the pad as he tried to turn the face, they steal a leg-bye
goodish length on the off stump, driven firmly towards mid-off, thinks of a single but is turned away
slower one bowled on a good length outside off, steered behind point, wide of third man, for a couple of runs
length ball and it's whacked, Hafeez waits for it as it lands in the zone and hammers it over mid-off, disdainfully
pitched it full on middle, pushes it gently towards mid-on, no single on offer
ooh, tried to chip it over mid-off but doesn't time it well, lands on the bounce to mid-off
tossed up on leg stump, chipped uppishly wide of the bowler towards mid-on
tossed up on leg stump and he sweeps it fine, uppishly but safely behind square for a boundary
flighted outside off, lands full and it's drilled through mid-off and extra cover for a boundary

Farhat has to go, Shakib slipped in a quicker one outside off and he played for the turn, and he feathered it to the keeper. Spontaneous appeal, but the umpire took a short while to raise his finger. Farhat tried to open the face on that one
ooh, lucky, tossed up outside off and Shafiq pushes at that one, tried to play it towards point, got a thick outside edge as it turned away and beat slip
floating it on the off stump, gets a stride out and plays it back to the bowler
lovely drive, pitched up, in the slot for Hafeez who square-drives it between cover and point, bisects the gap superbly
short of a good length outside off, chops it down behind point, wide of third man, for a couple of runs
pitched up on the off stump, driven straight towards mid-off, length ball again, single taken
just a hint of away movement there, guides it down towards third man for one more
short ball and it's pulled away but there is a deep square leg in place, he cuts it off, Hafeez picks a single
quick single, punches it solidly towards mid-off and races across the pitch
tossed up, pushed it away into the off side
pushes it quick on the off, gets on the back foot as he tries to poush it, gets an inside edge onto the pads
driven back to the bowler
gets forward and plays it towards extra cover
tossed up and Hafeez steps out of the crease, smacks it sweetly over the bowler's head towards the sightscreen, meaty hit
goes for the sweep this time, trying to strike it clean square but misses as it turns away
floats in towards middle, steps forward to play it into the off side
quicker through the air this time, gets an inside edge as he tries to push it into the off side
what turn, that was almost unplayable, fired in towards middle from round the wicket and it spits away to beat the batsman all ends up
fullish, driven firmly but wide of long-on for a couple of runs, they put pressure on the fielder there and Hafeez ran well to get to the other end with a dive
shortish on middle, moves away and chops it towards point, went on straight
shortish on the off, punched off the back foot towards extra cover
short, quick and wide, slashed hard down to third man, just a single in the end
full this time on middle, pushed towards midwicket from the crease, bowled it quick and he managed to get his bat down in time
similar delivery but this one's driven more firmly, wide of a diving midwicket, there is a long-on in place and he cuts it off, whipped more than drived

dropped, it was a no-ball as well for height, scooped it towards short fine leg who failed to hold on to a sharp chance, Hafeez had bent low but it would have probably been above waist height even if he had stood up upright
short and wide and he tries the upper-cut this time, doesn't make contact
played it towards third man for one more
flighted on the off, driven straight to extra cover
flighted on the off, played back towards the bowler
tries to play the reverse-sweep but doesn't make contact, beaten as it turns away
beaten as it spits away from middle and off, angled in and beat him as he offered the straight bat
Shakib's got him, what a lovely over, tossed it up but it went on straight, Hafeez went for the sweep as it landed on the off stump and missed, the ball held its line and dislodged off stump
turned away behind short fine, merited just a single as the fielder got around to it but made a mess of the slide and conceded two more
plays it towards midwicket
comes down the track and drives it wide of long-on for a couple, excellent running once again
turned in but not as much as he expected, defended it inside the line and was beaten
turned away towards midwicket
fires it quick on middle and it turns in a hint, chops it behind point, too close to play that shot but he managed it
short of a good length on the off, chopped in front of point and they sneak a single
pitched up on the off stump, driven off the front foot back to the bowler
banged in short this time and Shafiq weaved away from that one, sharp pace
goodish length on the off, gets across and turns it uppishly wide of short fine for a single
lovely flick, fired in on middle and he was quick to dispatch it, stood in his crease and whipped it over square leg to find the boundary
Umar's looking good, Rubel pitches this short outside off and Umar cuts it firmly past point and beats third man
turns it into the leg side towards square leg
gives him the charge but adjusts well when it's bowled a little short, tucked away wide of the diving Shakib for a couple more runs
whipped away behind square off the back foot for a couple of runs
turns it into the leg side wide of midwicket for a single
harsh on width is Umar Akmal, waited for it to turn in and it came at a good height, slashed it uppishly past point
gets on the back foot and taps it down into the off side
shortish outside off, chopped it towards point

quickish legspinner does the trick for Bangladesh, Umar had made up his mind, he stepped out of his crease to that shortish delivery outside off and missed when he tried to cut that as it turned away, Mushfiqur made no mistake
gets on the back foot to play it back towards the bowler
shortish on middle, gets back and punches it down to long-on for one more
short on the off, chopped down towards cover and he races through for a single, a missed attempt at a run-out at the non-striker's end
worked away wide of midwicket off the front foot for a single
turns down the leg side, lands on middle and turns down further, more extras to the runs tally

a couple of quick wickets for Bangladesh, Asad Shafiq tried to go downtown there, looked to launch him over long-off but didn't time it well at all, skied it to long-off where the fielder took it comfortably
swept it down towards deep square leg for a single
shortish outside off, chops it down towards point for a single
quicker through the air, on middle and leg, pushed it wide of midwicket for a single
gets on the back foot and plays it past square leg for a single
Malik waits for it to turn in, drops it down in front of cover and speeds off

a tame dismissal, Razzak strikes, with a full toss, Malik departs after just chipping back a straight delivery back to the bowler, he's not been in good form since his return, Bangladesh have fought back well. Razzak dived forward and to his right
turns it off the front foot towards midwicket
Afridi doesn't take long to announce his presence, charges down the track and launches that over wide long-off, powerfully struck
deflects off the pads, they sneak a leg-bye as it rolls past square leg
angling in towards middle, stretches out and plays it into the off side
shortish on the off, punched wide of cover
short ball outside off, slapped towards long-off for a single
shortish on middle, whipped past midwicket for a single
fires it down the leg side after he had made some room, wide
shortish on the off, swats it hard but straight to long-off
plays it into the leg side wide of midwicket into the deep, there are open spaces and he scampers back for the second
cracked into the off side  into the deep for a single

Afridi holes out, was caught just inside the ropes in front of long-off, quicker through the air and he lofted that high but couldn't quite clear the boundary, Nasir Hossain stayed alert throughout and judged it to perfection
full toss outside off, driven soundly through extra cover for a couple of runs
shortish outside off, a bit of turn, Tanvir wants to guide it past short third but makes no contact
turned off the back foot to short fine leg for a single
quicker through the air, pushed back towards the bowler
turns in from a good length, Tanvir just defends it into the off side
tickled it towards short fine leg, Tanvir speeds through to the other end to complete a quick single
goes on straight as he tries to open the face, beaten
turns it towards short fine for a quick single
fires it quick on the off, driven back to the bowler, excellent fielding as he dives to his left
chops that shortish delivery towards point to take a single
much slower through the air, pitched it wide outside off and Tanvir went for a slog, made no contact, a tight spell by Kapali here
shortish on the off, drags it behind square leg for a single
fullish on the off, driven hard towards long-on for a single
turns away, plays it wide of point for a single
slapped down to long-on for a single
Misbah gets a faint tickle, angling it down and Misbah turns the face to get it past short fine leg, has enough on it to reach the boundary
driven off the front foot towards long-off for a single
well fielded at short fine leg, that was full on the pads and Misbah flicked it fine but straight to that fielder, just the single

run-out, slower one and he tries to heave that, misses and Misbah wants the bye, Tanvir reacts late, Mushfiqur rolls the ball down to Shafiul who breaks the stumps at the non-striker's end but with an under-arm throw
smacked straight towards long-on for a single
on the pads and Umar was aiming to chip it over midwicket, missed and he had to steal a leg-bye
slower one bowled short outside off, pulled it hard but down to deep midwicket for just the single
slower one but misdirected, too wide and it's called by the umpire
length ball on middle and Umar Gul connects, and finds the gap, struck sweetly into that gap between long-on and deep midwicket for a boundary
